message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm the one who's really making the big move here!
You're getting a bit greedy, Bob! Let's try a more balanced split.
I'm still not convinced, Alice. You're not giving me enough credit for my negotiation skills!
You're not getting any younger, Bob. Let's make a deal before time runs out!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not going to let you get the better of me!
You're not getting any richer, Bob. Let's make a deal before it's too late!

You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm going to take it all!
